Thomas Peer provides a full-service platform from business process re-engineering to systems integration to long-range application management and support, eliminating the silo approach to solution delivery.

We work with our clients to understand their short and long term goals, then follow through with consulting and managed services required to realise continuous improvement and benefit realisation over time.  We build business solutions that deliver business outcomes.
Our IT professionals have helped some of Australia's leading enterprises conquer the ever-present challenges associates with managing dispersed technologies and evolving business processes.
Our Business and Technology Consulting services utilise the extensive experience of our team to work with you on strategic initiatives such as:

Our team of consultants have been responsible for the design and deployment of technology solutions for organisations across the breadth of Australia's business landscape.  We use this experience to enable us to recommend the technologies that will meet the business needs of our customers.

Thomas Peer will provide you with in-depth expert knowledge which will outline precisely how implementing Cloud technologies into your ogranisation can benefit your operations, your customer service and your bottom line.

With so many different vendors developing an array of new Cloud technologies and offerings, it is a challenge to keep abreast of what's relevant, and which companies offer solutions that can genuinely help you to gain a competitive edge, increase productivity, or enhance your profits.

Implementing a Cloud strategy into any business, of any size can be daunting. We have chosen to work with best of breed solutions partners. With security, network speeds, storage and availability all being equally important, you need an expert to guide you to help you plan and to deliver a solution with confidence.
We offer:

Our approach is supported by certified AMS consultants, our ITIL compliant SMART Methodology and a proven track record of successful engagements.  We provide predictable, measurable and sustained managed services to meet your needs.  Our team is comprised of a mix of local and remote skilled and experienced full-time resources.

Furthermore, after deploying complex solutions in customer environments often requires more than a simple handover.  To aid in the transition, Thomas Peer can support clients with technology deployments beyond the conclusion of professional services engagements, via customised support or managed services offerings.

Thomas Peer can provide you with a staff augmentation solution to meet your specific needs.  A dedicated Thomas Peer Recruitment Consultant will be available for your company.  Partner with us and have access to the best candidates, less administration time and reduced costs.

Maintaining a competitive edge in today's market requires businesses to fully focus on business objectives.  The outsourcing market is one that is continually growing as businesses resort to this reliable way of ensuring their projects are staffed with the best talent and at the best costs.

Thomas Peer has an extensive database of contractors who are ready for shot or long-term assignments. If your business needs are non-recurrent or if you have a project that is short term, it may prove to be more economical to hire temporary or contract staff who may become an even greater resource and boost the skill level of your company.
By using Thomas Peer contractors, you get a worker with the required skill right away and have time to determine whether they are delivering what your company needs.

There are also many distinct financial advantages to contracting out with Thomas Peer.  With Thomas Peer contractors, we cover all employer contribution to workers' compensation insurance, employer superannuation guarantee payments, employer liability insurances and state payroll taxes.  There is also no need to provide job benefits, including health insurance or retirement plans that you may provide to other employees in your organisation.
Additional benefits include:

Thomas Peer believes in and practices Best Practice Recruitment.  Put simply, it is the matching of the right candidate with the right job.  From a corporation's side it is the hiring of an individual who will add significant value to the organisation.  From an employee's perspective it is joining a company that fulfils their work and personal ambitions.

Thomer Peer's Best Practice Recruitment is built on a combination of simple and effective processes, natural screening techniques gained from years of effective recruitment and an in-depth IT industry knowledge.
Define the Need

Often the first step in recruiting is developing a Job Description focusing on the experience required.  But Thomas Peer looks deeper so that the best possible candidate is found.  We work with the client to clearly define all attributes required to successfully fill the role, including the values, motivations and intellect that would best match the vacancy.
Candidate Selection
Thomas Peer's Candidate Selection process is a multi-faceted approach covering all aspects of recruitment, from writing a job advertisement to the running an interview.
Communication

This is frequently the downfall of all recruitment; Best Practice Recruitment sets the expectations for the candidate in how they will be communicated with and then delivers on them. The worst crime of all is not giving the candidate any feedback when they have gone through the process, we always give feedback.
Contact us today for a no obligation technical consultation

Headquartered in Melbourne, Thomas Peer Solutions is a top tier IT services and management consulting firm offering a full range of advisory services, systems integration, and managed application services. With a presence across Australia, Thomas Peer has developed deep expertise in its targeted industries and has earned a reputation for delivering superior solutions that strengthen organisations’ operational performance. Our unwavering commitment to our clients’ needs has allowed us to build long-term, trusting and loyal relationships. It has given us the ability to set ambitious objectives for client projects and meet them time and time again with unparalleled speed and precision.

Technology functions within the context of every organisation’s business. We rely on technology without being ruled by it. That means we’ve worked hard to be responsive to the way our clients’ business works, not the other way around, and we look forward to delivering excellence in the future.

Thomas Peer BaaS makes it easy for Veeam customers to extend their backup infrastructure to the cloud. When you are running Veeam in your local on-premises, or cloud, you can now select Thomas Peer BaaS as a target for your offsite backups.  It's as easy as that!
We've made BaaS as simple as possible.  You only pay a low fee per VM and storage, nothing else.  Monthly PAYG pricing on 12/24/36 month options.
Use Thomas Peer as your Veeam Backup provider and you will not incur any data transfer charges from us.  Backup and restore as much as you like.
Within minutes of signing up with Thomas Peer you will be able to use your service.  Tailor how much storage you want then start backing-up.  No waiting.
